extendedInfo.description: College Prowler is a student community where you can ask questions, share tips, and discuss campus life at more than 7,000 colleges and universities. Since 2002, College Prowler has helped millions of students choose their school and make the most out of their college experience. With College Prowler on the iPhone, you can check out of the latest discussion at any school and ask questions on the go. You can also keep track of upcoming school events and scholarship deadlines.

reviews.title: No college profiles
reviews.comment: I thought you would actually be able to view the profiles of the colleges and universities instead of just being able to participate in conversations. Disappointed overall at this absence of this feature.
reviews.author: Sara Lance

reviews.title: Great! ...but....
reviews.comment: Im not sure if its just me (I have a galaxy s3) but whenever I scroll, the places to click the buttons dont move with it-pretty much making it a serious hassel to guess where to tap on the uncalibrated screen...fix that and its perfect!
reviews.author: m hill

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: The app does not even compare to the desktop website. Almost zero options
reviews.author: John Burlile

reviews.comment: I thought it would be like the desktop version.  Its terrible.
reviews.author: Brandon Leonard

reviews.title: Can\'t Sign In
reviews.comment: Signing in online works, but not with the app.
reviews.author: maliik morales

reviews.title: Needs more features like the site
reviews.comment: I cant compile a list of schools that meet all the requirements that I want from the app so this is my reason for the low ranking add more features and this app will be golden.
reviews.author: Anthony Pritchett

reviews.comment: It won\'t even let me even get on the app -.-
reviews.author: Sarita Ojeda

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: The app is good only bc i csn see what scholarship available but the problem is I cant click on any of them. There is less option than the website on the computer also. I throught this wojkd ve a vetter way for  me to access my scholarships but it is not\"
reviews.author: michaia wimberly

reviews.title: Uncalibrated touches
reviews.comment: I have to guess where to press the screen... :( Fix this bug!! It makes me unable to use the app it is so horrible. Besides having to guess where to tap on the screen, it has good potential and I like the functionality. Please add the new \"chance me\" feature in the future :)
reviews.author: Jack Walsh

reviews.title: Website much better
reviews.comment: Thought you would be able to view the schools stats and rankings but sadly that\'s only available to the website. Basically all you can do is join the chats and conversation. If that\'s what you\'re looking for you won\'t be disappointed. If you\'re looking for more just go online.
reviews.author: Stephen Nehr
